name: Spicy Orange Segments
keywords: brown sugar, coriander seeds, navel orange, orange blossom honey, rice vinegar, side dish
recipeIngredient: 9 ounces rice vinegar (1 cup plus 2 tablespoons)
1 ½ cups firmly packed brown sugar
¼ heaping teaspoon whole white peppercorns

recipeInstructions.text: Wash whole oranges, and pierce all over with fork. Soak in cold water for three days, changing the water every day.
Strain oranges and put them with remaining ingredients in heavy pan; simmer for 3 hours.
Remove pan from heat and let stand until oranges cool. Do not peel. Cut oranges into segments and serve as an accompaniment to red meats and poultry.
